item.title: My Journey in Architecture
item.description: After two years of working on an architectural project, it is ready to see the light of day. Read about my exploration of an architect’s work, starting at the sketch phase, and ending with a fully-working 2D and 3D model ready to construct.

item.title: New Russian School
item.description: My goal in this project was to design a completely new building for the Russian School of Austin. Follow along with me in my journey through the world of architecture as I sketch, plan, and model a building from the ground up.
